predicate.note: Frames file for 'derive' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'develop'.

roleset.name: create

example.name: passive, with source
example.text: About 30% of Ratners's profit already is derived *trace* from the U.S.

example.name: ergative, with source
example.text: Prosecutors have told Mr. Antar's attorneys that they believe Mr. Antar's allegedly ill-gotten gains are so great that any money he has used to pay attorneys derives from illegal activities.
example.arg: any money he has used to pay attorneys

example.name: with creator and attribute
example.text: John derived an ointment from beeswax, spring water and cigarette butts as a cure for the common cold.
example.arg: beeswax, spring water and cigarette butts
a cure for the common cold

roleset.note: Not actually sure that arg4 will occur. Arg2 seems absolutely necessary, though.
